alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Tarrant (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 3:15PM CDT until May 19 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Tarrant County in north central Texas... Northwestern Dallas County in north central Texas... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 315 PM CDT, a cluster of severe thunderstorms was located over Richland Hills, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dallas, Fort Worth, Arlington, Irving, Grand Prairie, Carrollton, Euless, Bedford, Grapevine, Haltom City, Keller, Coppell, Hurst, Farmers Branch, Southlake, Watauga, Colleyville, Addison, Richland Hills and North Richland Hills. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35W between mile markers 51 and 53. Interstate 35E between mile markers 433 and 444. Interstate 30 between mile markers 14 and 39. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
